body_html: @jsimsa, thank you for the fix. It seems to have made it into master because I can run the cod using the nightly build. Unfortunately, the performance is slightly worse than the original code that used batch instead of map_and_batch. I have updated the notebook.

body: @jsimsa, thank you for the fix. It seems to have made it into master because I can run the cod using the nightly build. Unfortunately, the performance is slightly worse than the original code that used `batch` instead of `map_and_batch`. I have updated the notebook.
